moves.1. e3: this first move baffled me, I have never seen anyone play this.
moves.1... e5 2. b3 Nf6: i open up the knight, that proves to be very useful later in the game
moves.4... d5: threatens knight, and later defends my knight.
moves.10. h3: creates a three move forced mate
moves.10... Qh4+: i bring my queen into the game
moves.12. Kf1 Qf2#: mate, one sitting as asked for.

gameName: For someone who is online now. (finish in one sitting)
